item.title: Finding classical deaths and revivals, like in the atom-field interaction?
item.description: Maybe it’s a tricky question $$\ddot{q_{i}}(t) = -(k_{i} + k_{i+1})q_{i}(t) + k_{i+1}q_{i+1}(t) + k_{i}q_{i-1}(t)$$
